name: F3MashUp
description:
This is a proof of concept for a genre mix of First Person Shooter games and Match 3 games.

The code is public domain, so feel free to copy and modify as you like

Link to the Source Code: https://github.com/chung03/FPS-Match3-Mashup-UE4

Link to the Models: https://github.com/chung03/F3MashupModels

Link to the Discord: https://discord.gg/5Kev3RH9DQ

The game is multiplayer and uses port 7777. If you host a game, you may need to do port forwarding to let others join your game.

There is no real single player.
